DOC.criteria: Severe pneumonia diagnosis criterion base `` Zhu Futang Practical Pediatrics '' ( 7th Edition ) `` guideline management communityacquired pneumonia child China '' ( Chinese Journal Pediatrics , 2013 , 51:745752 , 856862 ) . Severe pneumonia define pneumonia one following : 1. fever > 38.5℃ , 2. increase respiratory rate ( infant > 70/min，older child > 50/min ) , 3. dyspnea , 4. cyanosis , 5. multilobe involvement ≥ 2/3 lung involvement , 6. extrapulmonary complication , 7. pleural effusion , （8）Transcutaneous oxygen saturation ≤92 % .
